description: Update an existing OpenAI vector store.
permissions: Only admins can update OpenAI vector stores.
side_effects: Updates stored vector store attributes/relationships when permitted.
validation_notes: Requires the vector store <id> argument. At least one of --purpose, --scope, --scope-type, or --scope-id is required. --scope must be in Type|ID format when provided. --scope-type and --scope-id must be provided together. Purpose must be unique per scope_type/scope_id. If purpose is user_post_feed, scope must be present and be a UserPostFeed. If purpose is prediction_subject_lowest_losing_bid_recap, scope must be present and be a Broker. API resource marks purpose, scope_type, scope_id, and scope as read-only; attempts to set them via the API may be rejected.
